Attributes.description: Approved and supervised technical work experience in an industrial, university or government setting for a minimum of 14 weeks. Normally taken in the Summer Session (Terms 1 and 2) after fourth year. Technical report required. Restricted to students admitted to the Co-operative Education Program in Atmospheric Science.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ATSC 399 and one of ATSC 303, GEOB 304, GEOS 304.
